    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Entity
    Represents an abstract entity with a position and collision radius on a game board.
    Entity.Direction
    Enumeration of all possible directions entities can move in.
    EntityUtils
    Utility class providing helper methods for working with Entity objects.
    GameConfig
    Represents the configuration for a Pac-Man-style game.
    GameConfigFactory
    Utility factory class for building a GameConfig instance from a JSON file.
    GameState
    Represents the current state of the game, including the game configuration, board, entities (Pacman and ghosts), score, lives, and power mode status.
    GameState.TileType
    Enumeration of possible tile types on the board.
    Ghost
    Represents a ghost in the Pacman game.
    Ghost.GhostType
    Enum representing the four classic ghost types.
    Pacman
    Represents the Pacman character in the game.
    Position
    Represents a coordinate (x, y) on a 2D grid.
